overview: Ray Hewitt, a shell shocked Vietnam Vet, returns home years after the war to move in with his sister Doris. However, the forces of small town U.S.A., Doris's three children and old trauma threaten to push Ray over the edge. Yet, the strain of Ray's visit may be just what is needed for the family to discover the importance of one other.
tagline: One Man... One Mission... One TV
title: Living with Uncle Ray
